title: Tales from the Island of California
description: In Tales from the Island of California, by Catherine Weaver, almost anything could happen, and does. From an Amazon war, to a dryad love story, to the tale of an Imperial Phoenix, it is an amazing escape that transports you into magical worlds. An intriguing book of short stories filled with alternate histories, this short work may have you feeling that magic really is just around the corner.
author: Catherine  Weaver
